item.title: Uses
item.description: Hello World! Here are the lists of my tools I daily use for software development and gaming ğŸ‘‹ My daily use: Computer: Macbook Pro 15” 2019 Phone: Apple iPhone X Tablet: Apple iPad Pro 10.5 Watch: Garmin Forerunner 245 Sound: Apple AirPods 2 Backpack: The North Face Router My software development setup: Computer: Macbook Pro 15” 2019 Mouse: Logitech MX Master 2S Mousepad: Some random mousepad~ Keyboard: Keychron K4 Red Switch Sound: Apple AirPods 2 Monitor: Dell U2417H Software I daily use for software development: VSCode: The awesome text editor I mostly use for text editing.
